quizDescription: Challenge your mind with these intriguing riddles.

questions.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?
questions.explanation: An echo is a sound that is reflected off surfaces, creating the illusion of speech and hearing without a physical form.

questions.question: I'm taken from a mine, and shut up in a wooden case, from which I'm never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
questions.explanation: A pencil lead (graphite) is mined, encased in wood, and used for writing, but it is never truly released from the pencil.

questions.question: I'm not alive, but I can grow. I don't have lungs, but I need air. What am I?
questions.explanation: A fire consumes fuel and 'grows' as it spreads, but it is not a living entity and doesn't have lungs.

questions.question: I can fly without wings. I can cry without eyes. Wherever I go, darkness follows me. What am I?
questions.explanation: A cloud can 'fly' across the sky, 'cry' by releasing rain, and it often obscures the sun, creating darkness.

questions.question: What has keys but can't open locks?
questions.explanation: A keyboard has keys (letters/characters) but doesn't open locks. It's used for typing and input.

questions.question: I have keys but open no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but you can't go inside. What am I?
questions.explanation: A keyboard has keys (letters/characters) but doesn't open locks. It has space between keys but no physical room you can enter.

questions.question: I'm full of holes, but still hold water. What am I?
questions.explanation: A sponge has many holes or pores, but it can still absorb and hold water.

questions.question: I'm a word of letters three, add two and fewer there will be. What am I?
questions.explanation: The word 'few' has three letters. When you add two letters ('er'), you get 'fewer,' which means a smaller quantity.

questions.question: I'm black and white and loved all over the world. What am I?
questions.explanation: Pandas are black and white bears that are popular and loved worldwide.

questions.question: I'm not alive, but I can die. What am I?
questions.explanation: A battery provides power, but it can 'die' when it runs out of energy. It is not a living thing.
